name: horace_lung
text:
Wonderful, creeping cinematic detail.
The Devil's in the detail, Phillipe.

name: spinynorman
text:
This is sort of like a scene from a Coen brothers movie.

They would have an old hand character actor guaranteed for the role of the bartender.

name: the_voice
text: M. Emmett Walsh?

name: i_love_kate
text: That's it, I'm going to watch Blood Simple right now...

name: deimosrising
text: If only he knew what gelato was, this whole awkward thing would have been cut off at the pass, to indulge in the cliche.

name: evan
text: ice cream shop guy is Wilford Brimley.

name: red_dawn
text: Unfortunately, his constant consumption of his own gelato would bring on the Diabettus.

name: trap
text: We were talking about diabetes today, and my mustachioed  science teacher pronounced it 'DIABEETUS.' I couldn't stop laughing. Then I found out he was diabeetic.

name: laserblade
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: mikeronomicon
text: You get a chubby and extreme props for that. I tip my hat to you sir.

name: connellingus
text: Paul F. Weisz , actually.

name: andrewthepig
text: He certainly is.

name: agika
text: Is it a real ice cream shop? Is it a hallucination? Is it a metaphor? What's going on?!?!

name: rowboat
text: Philippe has entered the Black Lodge. The birds sing a pretty song and there's always music in the air.

name: idsyen
text: She's my cousin, but doesn't she look exactly like Wilford Brimley?

name: wilbur
text: Garmonbozia!

name: rowboat
text: That's right, The Mascara Snake!

name: octafish
text: Fast and Bulbous.

name: rowboat
text:
I can't for the life of me understand why I threw that reference out in this spot.

Maybe idsyen or wilbur used to have a relevant avatar?

name: fineoakstructure
text: I don't know, but it's really funny this way.

name: wolfslice
text:
I *love* this one. I cannot explain why but it is damned hilarious.

Definatly in my top 3.

name: deancain29
text: its terrfiying

name: joeyramoney
text: hilarious!

name: gormster
text: I love that all the buildup was for nothing... it really is an ice-cream shop.

name: ninjaein
text:
Yes, but why did Nice Pete bring Phillipe there?

Therein lies the question.

name: presterjohn
text: Where else would Nice Pete get ice cream? Not for Mr. Cropes the shiny flicker of sterile fluorescent lights at Baskin Robbins or the judgmental stares of housewives at the grocery. The almost-abandoned gelati shop is a perfectly Cropesian place to get sweet ices.

name: autrepoupee
text: I like to think that Nice Pete was sincerely trying to bond with Phillipe. He can't help but be menacing and insane, but maybe, just maybe, in his heart of heart's, he just wanted Phillipe to have the same kind of fun he remembered as boy.  Eat ice cream, viscerate Todd, set fires...Phillipe's already made a mess of his bed before, maybe Nice Pete sees a little of himself in the little otter.

name: lrosetw8
text: I like to think this too.

name: boredom_man
text: So did John Wayne Gacy.

name: cagliostro
text: You're receiving a chubby for teaching me a new word. Because I thought 'viscerate' was a typo for 'eviscerate', and I was about to make a joke about how it would involve stuffing someone with more entrails than they already had, when nameless unease tugged at my shirtsleeve and told me to make absolutely sure I wasn't about to make a cock of myself on the Internet. So I looked it up, and bugger me if it isn't a variant form of the same word. You have my deep gratitude, ma'am.

name: apricotta
text:
I remember this comment from when I first went through the archives. I wasn't sure if I gave you a chubby for it, so when this arc started (it's my second trip through the archives), I carefully read all the comments under every strip of the arc, just to find it.

And now I did. And I'm glad I see I actually did give it a chubby.

name: tomsonlocal
text:
Is it part of the shirt or is he wearing a black armband? If so, who's death is he mourning?

Maybe I'm reading too much into this.

name: paperboy_2000
text:
It's an old-timey thing.
[IMGS OFF]
The arm garter prevents the situation of a floppy shirtsleeve which might startle a dray horse.

name: spinynorman
text: I chubbied this over a year ago but I'd still be willing to chubby it again.

name: ibetso
text: smack smack snif...  perrrrfect sounds for sleeping-in-the-sitting-up-position

name: sonicbiology
text: Looks like the ice cream shop man's parents played "I've got your nose" with him...BUT NEVER GAVE IT BACK!

name: molesticide
text:
fucking my uncle did that to me.

i tried, years later, to get it back, but he had lost it somewhere in his attic. fucking JERK.

name: molesticide
text:
wh-woah! heh, this is probably my best 'accidental creepy statement as a product of missing a comma' ever.

fucking, my uncle would have been pissed.

name: lrosetw8
text: I didn't even notice that until you mentioned it, I somehow managed to read it the way you intended despite the lack of appropriate punctuation.

name: cagliostro
text:
I did not, and still prefer the original.

'It just fell clean off!'

name: hereward
text: Also why does the ice cream shop man look annoyed/scary/predatory?

name: ham_shoes
text: He's in cahoots with Nice Pete somehow.  We never got to find out for sure.  He's like those weirdos that hung out with Frank Booth.

name: wiliamthepleasr
text: Probably because he only has eyebrows when he is awake.

name: wildcat
text: Scared little Philippe in his bumblebee suit makes my heart ache!

name: rheabird13
text: that is one grim face. that's the sort of face grandpa gives you when he finds you stealing cookies before dinner. and then grandpa calls you "young lady" in a very scary voice. poor philippe. i think i feel extra bad for him mostly because of his pumps and extreme lack of arms. and also antennae which appear to be real.

name: stuntman
text: Obviously not impressed by an otter in a bee costume.  Nothing surprises this guy!

name: atypicaloracle
text: He is staring at that little otter in a bumble-bee costume in that way that old folks have got, where they can't decide if this thing annoys them or not.

name: duperando
text: Oh Lordy. The Old-person stinkeye is the WORST.

name: tragicone
text: You know, its really odd that they still hung out with pete after this
